devdoc.author: Gabriele Rigo - <gab@rigoblock.com>

balanceOf(address).details: Returns how many pool tokens a user holds.

params.amountOutMin: Minimum amount to be received, prevents pool operator frontrunning.

returns.netRevenue: Net amount of burnt pool tokens.

params.newSpread: Number between 0 and 1000, in basis points.

getPool().details: Symbol is stored as bytes8 but returned as string in the returned struct, unlocked is omitted as alwasy true.

params.length: - the number of words (32 bytes) of data to read.
params.offset: - the offset in the current contract's storage in words to start reading from.

returns._0: Bytes string of the bytes that were read.

getStorageSlotsAt(uint256[]).details: Returns a string with values regarless of where they are stored, i.e. variable, mapping or struct.

params.slots: The array of storage slots to query into.

returns._0: Bytes string composite of different storage locations' value.

initializePool().details: Pool can only be initialized at creation, meaning this method cannot be called directly to implementation.

params.amountOutMin: Minimum amount to be received, prevents pool operator frontrunning.

returns.recipientAmount: Number of tokens minted to recipient.

setKycProvider(address).details: Kyc provider can be set to null, removing user whitelist requirement.

params.transactionFee: Value of the transaction fee in basis points.

params.unitaryValue: Value of 1 token in wei units.

devdoc.title: RigoblockV3Pool - A set of rules for Rigoblock pools.

Approval(address,address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a token holder sets and approval.

KycProviderSet(address,address).notice: Emitted when pool operator sets a kyc provider.

MinimumPeriodChanged(address,uint48).notice: Emitted when pool operator updates minimum holding period.

NewCollector(address,address,address).notice: Emitted when pool operator updates fee collector address.

NewFee(address,address,uint16).notice: Emitted when pool operator sets new mint fee.

NewNav(address,address,uint256).notice: Emitted when pool operator updates NAV.

NewOwner(address,address).notice: Emitted when new owner is set.

PoolInitialized(address,address,address,.notice: Emitted when a new pool is initialized.

SpreadChanged(address,uint16).notice: Emitted when pool operator updates the mint/burn spread.

Transfer(address,address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a token is transferred.

VERSION().notice: Returns a string of the pool version.

authority().notice: Returns the address of the authority contract.

burn(uint256,uint256).notice: Allows a pool holder to burn pool tokens.

changeFeeCollector(address).notice: Allows owner to decide where to receive the fee.

changeMinPeriod(uint48).notice: Allows pool owner to change the minimum holding period.

changeSpread(uint16).notice: Allows pool owner to change the mint/burn spread.

constructor.notice: Owner is initialized to 0 to lock owner actions in this implementation.Kyc provider set as will effectively lock direct mint/burn actions.

decimals().notice: Decimals are initialized at proxy creation.

getPool().notice: Returns the struct containing pool initialization parameters.

getPoolParams().notice: Returns the struct compaining pool parameters.

getPoolStorage().notice: Returns the aggregate pool generic storage.

getPoolTokens().notice: Returns the struct containing pool tokens info.

getStorageAt(uint256,uint256).notice: Reads `length` bytes of storage in the currents contract.

getStorageSlotsAt(uint256[]).notice: Reads bytes of storage at different storage locations.

mint(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Allows a user to mint pool tokens on behalf of an address.

name().notice: Returns a string of the pool name.

owner().notice: Returns the address of the owner.

setKycProvider(address).notice: Allows pool owner to set/update the user whitelist contract.

setOwner(address).notice: Allows pool owner to set a new owner address.

setTransactionFee(uint16).notice: Allows pool owner to set the transaction fee.

setUnitaryValue(uint256).notice: Allows pool owner to set the pool price.

symbol().notice: Returns a string of the pool symbol.

totalSupply().notice: Returns the total amount of issued tokens for this pool.
